name: Armany Silk
deskripsi: This material provides maximum comfort, a luxurious appearance, and easy maintenance.

name: Taslan
deskripsi: Despite being water-resistant, Taslan fabric offers good air circulation, making it breathable and comfortable to wear in hot weather.

name: Balo telli
deskripsi: A very practical and comfortable choice for daily use. The soft, lightweight, durable, and easy-to-care-for balotelli fabric makes this prayer mat ideal for regular use.

name: Polyester Microfiber
deskripsi: A lightweight, durable, and easy-to-care-for fabric.

name: Rayon
deskripsi: Rayon has excellent moisture absorption properties, making rayon caps very comfortable, especially in hot weather or during long hours of activity. It helps keep the head dry and comfortable even when worn for extended periods.

name: Rayon Super
deskripsi: Super rayon has a smoother texture, giving clothing or accessories made from it a neater and more polished appearance. Even after washing, the fabric maintains its look and doesn't wrinkle easily.
